app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2073-4409/9/1/31/s1, Figure S1: Effects of eltrombopag on HCMV immediate early antigen (IEA) expression in primary human foreskin fibroblasts (HFFs), Table S1: Effects of eltrombopag addition at different time points during the HCMV replication, Table S2: Effects of eltrombopag in combination with deferasirox and foscarnet, Table S3: Effects of eltrombopag on HCMV late antigen (LA) expression in different cell types infected with different virus strains and isolates.
